Subject: Neo Beast Wars

From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>

Quickstrike:





Quickstrike watched Stingtra. Once she exited the waters, he had to use his 
enhancing vision to keep an eye on her. He was nearly jealous when he saw 
her eat the fruit. But he could eat something like that. He was all 
carnivore.

He sat up and transformed to beast mode, then crawled to the shore of the 
lake. His stomach bothered him, so he had to do something about it. He put 
his chin up to the water and drank what seemed to be 2 gallons of water.

He could feel the weather turning, dusk was coming in the matter of a few 
hours. He kept watching Stingtra. Before they went back to base, he might as 
well find something to eat. Something like antelope was out of the question, 
so he thought of the nest best, and closest thing. Fish. He had enough 
reflexes to nab one. He needed something more solid besides all that water. 
His stomach wasn't settling well.

He moved over to a spot, clawed over a boulder and watched the waters for a 
movement.
